title: PMS 2.0 589 - NFL Conference Championships Preview, Ian Rapoport, Darius Butler, Akshay Bhatia, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys preview this weekend's Conference Championship games and make their picks (:53-49:36, 1:33:08-1:42:34). Joining the show is NFL Network Senior Insider and friend of the progrum, Ian Rapoport to chat about the different coaching vacancies and GM roles that have been filled, what we should keep our eyes out for in terms of coaching hires made over the next few days, if Nathaniel Hackett in Denver means Rodgers is all but going to Denver, which guys are in and out this weekend or if everyone is full go, and much more (50:46-1:15:04). Next, 9 year NFL veteran at defensive back, host of the Man-To-Man Podcast, Darius Butler joins the show to throw his hat into the ring for the Colts Defensive Coordinator position, if he actually wants a potential coaching or front office job, and more (1:15:06-1:32:05). Later, 19 year old golf phenom, fresh off his first win on the Korn Ferry Tour, Akshay Bhatia joins the show to chat about his career path thus far, when he decided to wanted to become a professional golfer, his training habits at a young age, his relationship with his girlfriend/caddie, what his career goals are, how he's treated by the other golfers, and more (1:42:36-2:04:39). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
